main.name: Rahul Sahastrabuddhe
main.bio: Hi!! I am a graduate student pursuing my MS in Computer Science at University of Southern California. I am actively looking for Software Engineer roles starting from May 2019.
main.background: I have 3 years of work experience till date. I am workinga as Student Software Engineer at USC Norris Cancer Research Center from Jan 2018. Before that, I worked as Software Engineer at Tata Consultancy Services for 2 years (Sept 2015 - Aug 2017).
main.contactmessage: Want to hire me. Please contact below it works perfectly.
